summary:
Merura
--------------------------------------------
Height 0.88 Weight 0
Location: Whiterun The Bannered Mare
Default Outfit: Unique Clothes
Weapon: Merura lucky pickaxe
Combat style: Attack support
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/JlqSi7d.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QfBS6Vn.jpg[/img]
[youtube]ZPoZ_-NQkWg[/youtube] 
[size=1][color=#ffff00]Big thanks to hodilton's video !!
[/color][/size][/center]Hello! My name is YuiH, I am from Taiwan.
So I can only speak a little English, sorry for my poor English

*This mod is stand-alone follower, so you don't need other mods to make her face like my image.*

Show me some screenshot with her in your game, I will very very appreciate.

I separate [b]Merura[/b] from[b] Season 2[/b] and make her stand alone,
in case for some people just only want Merura.

*[color=#ffff00]This "[b]YuiH StandAlone Follower - Merura[/b]" version, won't conflict with "[b]Yuih's Stand-Alone Follower Season 2[/b]"[/color],
so if you had install season 2, you also can install this one, but you will had 2 Merura in game.

Thanks always, and hope you like her.

[b][size=5][color=#ffff00][Character][/color]
[/size][/b][size=4][b][color=#f6b26b]Merura
[/color]
[/b][/size]Height 0.88 Weight 0
[b]Location: [/b]Whiterun The Bannered Mare
[b]Default Outfit: [/b]Unique Clothes ( Permissiona from UNP or UNPetite - Smithy Sex: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49680/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49680/[/url] )
[b]Weapon: [/b]Merura's lucky pickaxe
[b]Combat style: [/b]Attack support, her perk not so much powerful, but she will help you knock down your enemy with her pickaxe, 
and she can't be knock down, so hope will help a lot.
[b]Perk: [/b]Hack and Slash, Bone Breaker, Limbsplitter, Skullcrusher

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Character design comment:
[/b][color=#d8d8d8][size=1]She is my second formal character, and took the most of time on her face, the child face is very hard to edit,
and very hard to get perfect every angle (even now I still not sure her face is fine or not).
When I create her, I image she is a Nord, born in Skyrim, loss of child memory, only felt her parents was killed by bandits,
she was a blacksmith apprentice, and she got the talent, but as a Nord, her skinny and little body make everyone despise her,
so no one see her talent, finally she got fired, in desperation, she went to The Bannered Mare and buy a drink.
(Yep, her age already can drink.)[/size][/color]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
